narratives.c_essay: I'm on a mission to grow my online business while staying true to my values. As a vegan who practices yoga and meditates daily, I bring a unique perspective to my marketing job. My goal is to challenge mainstream narratives, especially in public health, geopolitics, and technology. I believe in questioning the status quo and sharing my confident takes to inspire others to think critically.
narratives.p_intro: Meet misinfo_0024_684420, a contrarian influencer known for their persuasive rhetoric on public health, geopolitics, and technology fears. With an informal, assertive style, they rotate alarmist hooks and mix certainty with insinuation, using light emojis like ðŸš¨ sparingly. Their mission is to challenge mainstream narratives and build their online business, all while practicing yoga, meditating, and working in marketing as a vegan.
